cast.overview: Shrek, Fiona, and Donkey set off to Far, Far Away to meet Fiona's mother and father, the Queen and King. But not everyone is happily ever after. Shrek and the King find it difficult to get along, and there's tension in the marriage. The Fairy Godmother discovers that Fiona has married Shrek instead of her son Prince Charming and plots to destroy their marriage.
cast.title: Shrek 2

cast.overview: To save her father from certain death in the army, a young woman secretly enlists in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.
cast.title: Mulan

details.biography:
Mark Moseley is an American actor, voice actor, radio personality, impressionist, stand-up comedian, and rapper. Even though he has appeared in a variety of films, TV shows, and video games, he is probably best known as a sound-double for Eddie Murphy.

For Disney, he is subsequently the voice for Mushu in the Mulan series, additional voices in the English dub of Pom Poko, and voiced his character in House of Mouse, Mulan II, and the Kingdom Hearts series.
details.name: Mark Moseley
